title: JJW Spark Premium Watchface AW

description: A premium collection of nine different colored JJW Spark watch face designs now available for round and square Android Wear devices including the Sony SmartWatch 3, LG G Watch R, Moto 360, Asus Zenwatch and more! This watch face collection brings class, style and SPARK to your wrist! Colors include:- JJW Spark Orange- JJW Spark Ruby- JJW Spark Saphire- JJW Spark Lime- JJW Spark Fuschia- JJW Spark Violet- JJW Spark Steel- JJW Spark Gold- JJW Spark RainbowNote:This watchface is optimised for both square and round screens.For more great watch faces for your Android Wear watch, follow and Like Us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/JJWwatchfacesBe sure to checkout my other watchface creations for Android Wear and the Sony(TM) SmartWatch 2 and if you like this watchface, please consider giving me a good rating as it inspires me to come up with even better designs!Note: This is an optimised Android Wear Lollipop watch face design and works in active and low power (ambient) mode to save your watch's battery. By using this watchface you should still continue to get great battery life from your watch unlike other 'pseudo-watchface apps' which chew through your battery.Requires at least Android 5.0.x (Lollipop) on your Android Wear device.Installation instructions:1. Download app via Google Play2. Click the 'Android Wear' notification in the notifications bar to open the Android Wear configuration app3. Click 'More' watch faces button4. Choose the new watchface from the list of watchfaces5. Enjoy!Alternatively, select the watch face directly on the watch by tapping and holding down on your Android Wear watch screen.For technical support or questions, please write a post on my Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/JJWwatchfaces  and I'll do my best to help.
descriptionHTML:
A premium collection of nine different colored JJW Spark watch face designs now available for round and square Android Wear devices including the Sony SmartWatch 3, LG G Watch R, Moto 360, Asus Zenwatch and more! This watch face collection brings class, style and SPARK to your wrist!

Colors include:

- JJW Spark Orange
- JJW Spark Ruby
- JJW Spark Saphire
- JJW Spark Lime
- JJW Spark Fuschia
- JJW Spark Violet
- JJW Spark Steel
- JJW Spark Gold
- JJW Spark Rainbow


Note:This watchface is optimised for both square and round screens.

For more great watch faces for your Android Wear watch, follow and Like Us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/JJWwatchfaces

Be sure to checkout my other watchface creations for Android Wear and the Sony(TM) SmartWatch 2 and if you like this watchface, please consider giving me a good rating as it inspires me to come up with even better designs!

Note: This is an optimised Android Wear Lollipop watch face design and works in active and low power (ambient) mode to save your watch's battery. By using this watchface you should still continue to get great battery life from your watch unlike other 'pseudo-watchface apps' which chew through your battery.
Requires at least Android 5.0.x (Lollipop) on your Android Wear device.

Installation instructions:

1. Download app via Google Play
2. Click the 'Android Wear' notification in the notifications bar to open the Android Wear configuration app
3. Click 'More' watch faces button
4. Choose the new watchface from the list of watchfaces
5. Enjoy!
Alternatively, select the watch face directly on the watch by tapping and holding down on your Android Wear watch screen.


For technical support or questions, please write a post on my Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/JJWwatchfaces and I'll do my best to help.
